page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Our block covers both land and water;75% is the River Clyde,16.5% is farmland,mainly pasture and 8.5% is residential.The residential area covers most of the village of Cardross which lies halfway between Helensburgh and Dumbarton. The character of the village has changed over the past 20 years becoming a commuter village for people who work in Helensburgh, Dumbarton and Glasgow. Information can be found on the following topics:_ Local History, Ecology, Farming, Population, Employment, Health, Transport, Law and Order, Clubs, Recreation, Social Concern, Religion, Arts and Crafts, Biography and Attitudes.
